column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////All in all tapas are never cheap
column3: along with plenty of complimentary bread and olive oil
column4: you can actually get fairly full without breaking the bank. We averaged around $12/person on just food
column5: and with drinks it just brought it a little higher
column6: which is not bad at all. Also
column7: they knew it was our first time there
column8: so they even brought us out a trio of desserts
column10: which was a great way to end the meal and start off the night. For that and their happy hour
column11: they are definitely warrant another half star(4.5/5)
